scripts.update: cd src && go get -u && go mod tidy
scripts.gen:client: rm -rf src/client && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.yaml -g go -o ./src/client/ -c openapiConfigClient.json && rm ./src/client/go.mod ./src/client/go.sum
scripts.gen:server: rm -rf src/server && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.yaml -g go-server -o ./src/server/ -c openapiConfigServer.json
